title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Language Education with AI: Ethical Implementation and Cognitive Partnerships

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and foundational concepts in language education
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: One can select customized content tailored to individual learner needs using AI-based language learning tools.
One can identify and explain at least three ethical issues (e.g., data bias, privacy) that may arise during the educational application of AI technology.
One can design collaborative learning scenarios between humans and AI by applying the Cognitive Partnership Model.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
